terms.1p: By using MedSnap, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree, please do not use the service.
terms.2p: MedSnap offers an AI-powered clinical diary for aesthetic medicine and personalized treatments.
terms.3p: You agree to use the service in accordance with all applicable laws and not to use it for any illegal purposes.
terms.4p: Some features may require registration. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.
terms.5p: Your privacy is important to us. Please read our Privacy Policy to understand how your data is used.
terms.6p: All content, trademarks, and technology of MedSnap are owned by the company and protected by law.
terms.7p: MedSnap is not responsible for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the service.
terms.8p: We may modify these terms at any time. We will notify users about significant changes.
terms.9p: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at:contato@medsnap.com
pp.respect: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.
data.collec.1: We collect the information you provide to us directly when using our services, such as your name, email, and phone number.
use_data.1: We use your data to improve our services, send important updates, and provide a personalized experience.
data_sharing.1: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with trusted partners to help operate the service.
security.1: We implement security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access.
your_rights.1: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time.
contact.1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: privacy@medsnap.com
our_website: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience.
what_are_cookie.1: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website.
how_we_use.1: We use cookies to remember your preferences, analyze site usage, and provide personalized content.
managing_cookies.1: You can control and/or delete cookies through your browser settings.
consent.1: By continuing to browse our website, you agree to the use of cookies as described in this policy.
essentialcookies.1: Necessary for the basic functioning of the website.
performance_cookies.1: They help us understand how you use the site to improve your experience.
marketing_cookies.1: Used to show relevant ads based on your interests.
